faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion PPM Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion PPM Training includes modules such as Project Foundation, Project Costing, Project Billing, Project Control, Project Performance Reporting, Project Contracts, and Functional Setup Manager. A detailed syllabus is available in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are held from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour classes each day. This schedule ensures consistent learning and interaction with Oracle Fusion PPM Cloud.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All sessions are scheduled from Monday to Saturday to maintain learning continuity.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer self-paced study. However, please note that these sessions do not include live doubt-clearing support.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are available based on performance in mock evaluations. These internships provide practical exposure to Oracle PPM tools and real-world projects.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single PPM Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle Fusion PPM Training is offered as a complete package. We do not provide individual modules separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer end-to-end resume assistance specifically tailored to Oracle Fusion PPM roles, highlighting your skills and project experience.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a laptop or desktop is required to access the Oracle Cloud instance and complete hands-on practice tasks during training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. The course is beginner-friendly and designed to start from the basics. A basic understanding of project management is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We begin with fundamental concepts and progress to advanced features, making it ideal for both beginners and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide complete job placement support including mock interviews, resume optimization, and guidance. Our network includes top employers hiring for Oracle PPM roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle Fusion PPM Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist with certification prep by providing sample questions, study material, and expert mentoring to help you clear Oracle Fusion PPM certification exams.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all session recordings will be available for 1 year. Detailed study materials, including process documentation with screenshots, are also provided.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we share module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interviews to prepare you for real-time job interviews.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 5 months of Oracle Cloud instance access so you can gain hands-on experience without needing to install any software.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, with your 1-year course access, you can attend future batches of Oracle Fusion PPM training at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, after successful completion, you will receive a Course Completion Certificate in Oracle Fusion PPM Cloud from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding is required. This is a functional course focused on configuration and business process implementation in Oracle Fusion PPM.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 1-on-1 personalized training sessions on request. Pricing will differ from standard group batches.
